author: Special Correspondent
text: The Coimbatore–bound Jan Shatabdi Express from Mayiladuthurai suffered detention for over an hour at Kuthalam station near Mayiladuthurai because of technical snag in the diesel locomotive. The express train left Mayiladuthurai in the afternoon and its loco developed technical snag at Kuthalam station leading to the detention of the train for nearly 100 minutes. Sources said a relief locomotive was moved from Mayiladuthurai to haul the train for its onward journey.
title: Loco failure holds up Jan Shatabdhi train
